TASK_IMAGE_TO_IMAGE.instillShortDescription: Modify an image based on a text prompt.

cfg_scale.description: How strictly the diffusion process adheres to the prompt text (higher values keep your image closer to your prompt)

engine.description: Stability AI Engine (model) to be used.
engine.title: Engine

image_strength.description:
How much influence the `init_image` has on the diffusion process. Values close to `1` will yield images very similar to the `init_image` while values close to `0` will yield images wildly different than the `init_image`. The behavior of this is meant to mirror DreamStudio's "Image Strength" slider.

This parameter is just an alternate way to set `step_schedule_start`, which is done via the calculation `1 - image_strength`. For example, passing in an Image Strength of 35% (`0.35`) would result in a `step_schedule_start` of `0.65`.

init_image.description: Image used to initialize the diffusion process, in lieu of random noise.

init_image_mode.description: Whether to use `image_strength` or `step_schedule_*` to control how much influence the `init_image` has on the result.

prompts.description: An array of prompts to use for generation.
prompts.title: Prompts

sampler.description: Which sampler to use for the diffusion process. If this value is omitted we'll automatically select an appropriate sampler for you.

seed.description: Random noise seed (omit this option or use `0` for a random seed)

step_schedule_end.description: Skips a proportion of the end of the diffusion steps, allowing the init_image to influence the final generated image.  Lower values will result in more influence from the init_image, while higher values will result in more influence from the diffusion steps.

step_schedule_start.description: Skips a proportion of the start of the diffusion steps, allowing the init_image to influence the final generated image.  Lower values will result in more influence from the init_image, while higher values will result in more influence from the diffusion steps.  (e.g. a value of `0` would simply return you the init_image, where a value of `1` would return you a completely different image.)

steps.description: Number of diffusion steps to run.

style_preset.description:
Pass in a style preset to guide the image model towards a particular style.
This list of style presets is subject to change.

weights.description: An array of weights to use for generation. If unspecified, the model will automatically assign a default weight of 1.0 to each prompt.

items.description: Weight of the prompt (use negative numbers for negative prompts)

weights.title: Weights

items.description: The seed associated with this image

TASK_TEXT_TO_IMAGE.instillShortDescription: Generate a new image from a text prompt.

cfg_scale.description: How strictly the diffusion process adheres to the prompt text (higher values keep your image closer to your prompt)

engine.description: Stability AI Engine (model) to be used.
engine.title: Engine

height.description:
Height of the image to generate, in pixels, in an increment divible by 64.

Engine-specific dimension validation:
- SDXL Beta: must be between 128x128 and 512x896 (or 896x512); only one dimension can be greater than 512.  
- SDXL v0.9: must be one of 1024x1024, 1152x896, 1216x832, 1344x768, 1536x640, 640x1536, 768x1344, 832x1216, or 896x1152
- SDXL v1.0: same as SDXL v0.9
- SD   v1.6: must be between 320x320 and 1536x1536

prompts.description: An array of prompts to use for generation.
prompts.title: Prompts

sampler.description: Which sampler to use for the diffusion process. If this value is omitted we'll automatically select an appropriate sampler for you.

seed.description: Random noise seed (omit this option or use `0` for a random seed)

steps.description: Number of diffusion steps to run.

style_preset.description:
Pass in a style preset to guide the image model towards a particular style.
This list of style presets is subject to change.

weights.description: An array of weights to use for generation.

items.description: Weight of the prompt (use negative numbers for negative prompts)

weights.title: Weights

width.description:
Width of the image to generate, in pixels, in an increment divible by 64.

Engine-specific dimension validation:
- SDXL Beta: must be between 128x128 and 512x896 (or 896x512); only one dimension can be greater than 512.  
- SDXL v0.9: must be one of 1024x1024, 1152x896, 1216x832, 1344x768, 1536x640, 640x1536, 768x1344, 832x1216, or 896x1152
- SDXL v1.0: same as SDXL v0.9
- SD   v1.6: must be between 320x320 and 1536x1536

items.description: The seed associated with this image
